thread.title: Here, there, and everywhere: From online reservations to a glowing weekend
thread.title_full: Here, there, and everywhere: From online reservations to a glowing weekend - The Boston Globe

author: Kari Bodnarchuk
title: Here, there, and everywhere: From online reservations to a glowing weekend
text:
By Kari Bodnarchuk Globe correspondent September 05, 2015
Here
MAKE A BOSTON-AREA DINING RESERVATION ONLINE
A new online site lets you select a restaurant in the Greater Boston area and make a reservation from your computer or mobile device. To start, go to Hautseet.com (pronounced “hot-seat”) and track down a restaurant by name or by cuisine type — search for American, Jamaican, or Portuguese eateries, or for vegetarian, seafood, or pizza, for instance. Then choose a reservation time and select your preferred table from the list by consulting the restaurant’s seating plan. Finally, you can opt to preorder your meal by selecting items from the online menu, and indicate any special instructions or allergies. hautseet.com/ .
There
RUN AROUND KILIMANJARO WITH A WORLD RECORD HOLDER
Join Tanzania’s most famous trail runner, Simon Mtuy, for the Kilimanjaro Stage Run during which you’ll spend eight days running 162 miles around the base of Africa’s tallest mountain. Follow footpaths leading through lush rain forests and small villages as you take in stunning views of Mount Kilimanjaro. You’ll average about 19 miles a day, as you run with half a dozen Tanzanian runners, up to 12 international runners, and Mtuy, who holds world records for the fastest ascent and fastest descent of Kilimanjaro. The event, offered through Extraordinary Journeys Oct. 17-27, includes support vehicles, water, snacks, meals, and daily camps set up for runners. Price: $2,125 per person, including all meals, accommodations, support, gear, and airport transfers; international airfare not included. 212-226-7331, https://ejafrica.com/blog/kilimanjaro-stage-run
GEORGIA EVENT WILL LEAVE YOU GLOWING
Continue reading below
Take a trip to Georgia’s Sea Island resort this Columbus Day for the Glow-in-the-Dark Weekend. This three-day event, Oct. 9-11, offers guests glowing manicures and pedicures, black-light volleyball and ping pong, and a sensory dinner in the dark. Start the weekend off with a stop at the resort’s spa, where you can get glow-in-the-dark treatments to make you stand out when darkness falls. Listen to the residential naturalist’s free presentation about animals and plants that glow in the dark, attend a stargazing session for $35, and join in the free black-light volleyball tournament or a glowing game of Ping-Pong at Club Paddle. Then enjoy the glow-in-the-dark dinner Saturday night, when you’ll enjoy sparkly cocktails, neon desserts, and an experience that taps your senses ($58 per person). Rooms start at $185. 800-732-4752, www.seaisland.com
Everywhere
KEEP WORKOUT AND TRAVEL CLOTHES ORGANIZED
Eagle Creek’s new Pack-It Sport collection lets you easily organize and carry your workout or travel gear while on the go. Choose the Wet Dry Fitness Locker to keep wet and dry clothes separate, the Garment Envelope for keeping business and travel clothes presentable while you work out, the Laundry Stuffer for holding dirty clothes, the Wallaby bag for your toiletries, and the Shoe Locker to pack shoes in your luggage without mucking up your clothes and other items. The Pack-It Sport bags and pouches come in different sizes, have an antimicrobial treatment for containing odors, and are lightweight and machine washable. Prices range from $18 for the Pack-It Sport Laundry Stuffer to $55 for the Pack-It Sport Travel Set, which includes the garment envelope, fitness locker, and wet zip pouch. 888-824-9460, www.eaglecreek.com
HEALTH SNACKS FOR THE ROAD
Grab a box of GoGo squeeZ flavored applesauce packets as you head out the door and have healthy snacks while traveling. These all-natural snacks, made with 100 percent real fruit, come in squeezable 3.2-ounce pouches, have re-sealable lids, taste great at room temperature, and are gluten, dairy, and nut free and are kosher certified. Varieties include ApplePineapple, AppleApple, ApplePear, AppleCinnamon, AppleBerry, and AppleMango. You can also buy organic, and fruit and veggie GoGo squeeZ packets. Available in singles and packs of 4, 12, and 48. Prices range from about $1 to $1.29 per packet, depending on quantity. 888-288-7148, www.gogosqueez.com
KARI BODNARCHUK
